document_data.name: Faernar
document_data.mainbody: '''Faernor''' were [[specialty priest]]s devoted to [[Berronar Truesilver]], the Matron of Home and Hearth.
document_data.Culture: The vast majority of faernor were either [[gold dwarves]] or [[shield dwarves]], but members of all of the [[dwarf]] races, to include both males and females, could become a faernar.
document_data.Abilities:
Most faernor were skilled healers and herbalists.

In addition to their normal [[spell]]s, faernor could cast ''[[cure light wounds]]'', ''[[aid]]'', ''[[spiritual hammer]]'', ''[[cure disease]]'', ''[[detect lie]]'', ''[[cure serious wounds]]'', ''[[neutralize poison]]'', ''[[fortify]]'', ''[[cure critical wounds]]'', ''[[succor of Berronar]]'', ''[[wall of force]]'', ''[[wall of iron]]'', and ''[[wall of stone]]'' on a daily basis. They could also cast ''[[gate]]'' twice per tenday. Any [[protection sphere]] spells cast by a faernar were cast with skill beyond their current ability.
document_data.Possessions: Faernor wielded [[battle axe]]s, [[club]]s, [[crossbow]]s, [[flail]]s, [[hand axe]]s, [[mace]]s and [[morning star]]s. They did not have restrictions on the type of [[armor]] they were permitted to wear.
